name: A.O.O.F.A.D: All Of Our Friends Are Dead
name_original: A.O.O.F.A.D: All Of Our Friends Are Dead
description: All Of Our Friends Are Dead is a classic indie horror platformer where all rules, concept, and sense of fairness have been cast to the wind. Survive the cruelest edge of insanity and gaze upon mysterious sights of things which may or may not be.
